evidence.source_document: Complaint For Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Plaintiffs bring this action under the APA and the Declaratory Judgment Act to challenge ICE’s illegal termination of their SEVIS records.

evidence.source_document: Complaint For Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: in violation of the Administrative Procedure Act (“APA”), the Fifth Amendment and the Equal Protection Clause to the U.S. Constitution
